metadata.dc:author: Melgarejo Moreno, C
Melgarejo Moreno, P
Hellín Meseguer, D
metadata.dc:description: A histochemical study, with lectins, in oropharyngeal cavity of 5 Syrian golden Hamsters (Mesocricetus auratus) was performed in order to know the tongue submucous glands characteristics. Results showed a strong reactivity to HPA lectin for secretions of submucous glands of the Hamster's tongue and a slight reactivity to N-WGA and to WGA lectins.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio histoquímico mediante lectinas de las glándulas submucosas linguales. Estudio en el hámster.
[Histochemical study with lectins submucous glands of the hamster's tongue].
